publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7244 Patricia Ferguson: 1st Birthday of Caldercuilt Primary School Bankâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Caldercuilt Primary on the 1st birthday of its school bank; notes that over 130 pupils have accounts with the bank; recognises the achievement of the P5 bank tellers whose hard work and enthusiasm have helped to establish the bank as a Caldercuilt institution, and thanks the school staff for their support and David McGregor and his staff at the Royal Bank of Scotland, Maryhill Road, Glasgow, for their enthusiasm and commitment to the project. Supported by: Pauline McNeill*
S3M-7244 1st Birthday of Caldercuilt Primary School Bank (lodged on 25 October 2010) Jackie Baillie*, Karen Whitefield*
S3M-7244 1st Birthday of Caldercuilt Primary School Bank (lodged on 25 October 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Hugh Henry*, Jack McConnell*
